description: Lists events for a given source identifier and source type. You can also specify a start and end time. For more information on DMS events, see Working with Events and Notifications in the Database Migration Service User Guide.

parameters.name: SourceType
parameters.description: The type of DMS resource that generates events. Valid values: replication-instance | replication-task.

parameters.name: EventCategories
parameters.description: A list of event categories for the source type that you've chosen. (string) ---

parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: Filters applied to events. The only valid filter is replication-instance-id. (dict) --- Identifies the name and value of a filter object. This filter is used to limit the number and type of DMS objects that are returned for a particular Describe* call or similar operation. Filters are used as an optional parameter for certain API operations. The name of the filter as specified for a Describe* or similar operation. The filter value, which can specify one or more values used to narrow the returned results. (string) ---

nested_params.name: Name
nested_params.description: The name of the filter as specified for a Describe* or similar operation.

nested_params.name: Values
nested_params.description: The filter value, which can specify one or more values used to narrow the returned results.

parameters.name: MaxRecords
parameters.description: The maximum number of records to include in the response. If more records exist than the specified MaxRecords value, a pagination token called a marker is included in the response so that the remaining results can be retrieved. Default: 100 Constraints: Minimum 20, maximum 100.

nested_items.name: Marker
nested_items.description: An optional pagination token provided by a previous request. If this parameter is specified, the response includes only records beyond the marker, up to the value specified by MaxRecords.

nested_items.name: SourceIdentifier
nested_items.description: The identifier of an event source.

nested_items.name: SourceType
nested_items.description: The type of DMS resource that generates events.

nested_items.name: EventCategories
nested_items.description: The event categories available for the specified source type.
